section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
The European Nursery Products Confederation is a trade association uniting child care product manufacturers in Europe. It is composed of national associations representing SMEs and multinational companies. The ENPC aims to ensure that safety requirements in legislation covering child care articles are met. 
 
Child care articles are products designed or obviously intended to safely facilitate seating, bathing, changing and general body care, such as feeding, sleeping, transportation and protection, for children up to 4 years of age. ENPC is a liasion partner of the European Standardisation Organisation and ENPC's members are actively involved in the development of standards.
